__e: Arrests have bean made all over the city.

If you'd read your Bible... instead of hanging around canteens and native quarters all your life... you'd know that Mesopotamia... this, this very spot that you're standing on this very minute... is the actual Garden of Eden.
You've got at least five arrests for assault.
This woman can rot in one of Saladin's prisons until her hair turns white before I'll trade with the man that killed my friends!
For your information, the jails in Venice are under water. OK.
I do not like prisons of any kind.
There will be other men, from prison camps the concentration camps, the conquered countries.
Look what I gave her, poor thing. My times in jail... and the kids going hungry.
More nests of conspirators and saboteurs have been uncovered... and further arrests are expected shortly.
I understand your jails are very damp, and your heating facilities are totally inadequate.
Cages are very unpleasant, aren't they?

The whole situation should be brought to a conclusion, should be stretched to the breaking point, so that not a trace of submission and baseness is left in us, even if this leads to mass arrests and torture.
The prisons we live in today... might have taken more than a day to build... but it doesn't take long to destroy them.
Then, all the petrification, the egg-shaped prisons, the Door of Time are necessary... to deliver the precious substance and keep it intact.
